headline: Take-Two's New Cloud Gaming Deal in India Might Change The Case For Investing In TTWO
summary: Earlier this month, Netgem announced a new partnership with 2K, a Take-Two Interactive label, to bring Mafia: Definitive Edition to JIO platform users in India, featuring an enhanced remake of the original game and exploring opportunities for additional franchise rollouts. This collaboration highlights Take-Two's ongoing focus on international distribution and expanding the reach of its popular franchises through emerging cloud gaming platforms. We'll now examine how Take-Two's new...
